name: part_014
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Minato Aqua perform the song 'Deep Blue Town e Oide'.
Transition scene with a dark stage and guest silhouettes appearing.
Performance of the song 'Memeshikute' by Houshou Marine and her guests.

subtitles.original: ハロニホン　こんにちは　ボンジュール　グーテンターク　アロハ！
subtitles.english: Halo-nihon, hello, bonjour, guten tag, aloha!

subtitles.original: 小さな頃に憧れた　僕を導き夢見たヒロイン
subtitles.english: The heroine I admired and dreamed of when I was little

subtitles.original: 何でもなれると信じてた　神様も見えてた不思議
subtitles.english: I believed I could become anything, a miracle where I could even see God

subtitles.original: 今　その中で流れていく　時の速さの低位で
subtitles.english: Now, flowing within it, at the low speed of time

subtitles.original: 忘れかけた奇跡を　もう一度信じられたら
subtitles.english: If I could believe in the forgotten miracle once again...

subtitles.original: 響け　波のメロディ
subtitles.english: Resonate, melody of the waves

subtitles.original: 嬉しい気持ち　いつでもベイビー　優しく包むこの街
subtitles.english: A happy feeling, always baby, this town that gently embraces us

subtitles.original: 最後は魔法を解かさない　明日の光射すディープ・ブルー
subtitles.english: Don't let the magic break at the end, the light of tomorrow shines, Deep Blue

subtitles.original: ハロニホン　こんにちは　ボンジュール　グーテンターク　アロハ！
subtitles.english: Halo-nihon, hello, bonjour, guten tag, aloha!

subtitles.original: 幼き時と変わらない　溢れる青と海が生まれるスマイル
subtitles.english: Unchanged since childhood, a smile born from the overflowing blue and the sea

subtitles.original: 昨日喧嘩した友達も　明日には笑うよ　アハハハ
subtitles.english: Friends I fought with yesterday will laugh tomorrow, ahahaha

subtitles.original: 海の呼吸に身を寄せて　目を閉じて感じようよ
subtitles.english: Let's lean into the ocean's breath, close our eyes and feel it

subtitles.original: 暗闇に響く歌　優しく感じられたら
subtitles.english: If I could feel the song echoing in the darkness gently...

subtitles.original: 深く　夢にダイブ
subtitles.english: Dive deep into the dream

subtitles.original: 激しい愛し　心のままに　笑顔で溢れてる街
subtitles.english: Intense love, as your heart desires, a town overflowing with smiles

subtitles.original: 海いっぱいの愛も届けたい　伝わっていくよディープ・ブルー
subtitles.english: I want to deliver sea-full of love, it's being conveyed, Deep Blue

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi hi!

subtitles.original: ハイハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi hi hi!

subtitles.original: もっと！
subtitles.english: More!

subtitles.original: まだまだ！
subtitles.english: More and more!

subtitles.original: うーん、ラッキー！
subtitles.english: Ooh, lucky!

subtitles.original: 海の心を心から　繋がる所を愛に
subtitles.english: From the heart of the sea, making the connection place into love

subtitles.original: 忘れないで奇跡を　君の側で感じるさ
subtitles.english: Don't forget the miracle, I'll feel it by your side

subtitles.original: 届けて　水のリズム
subtitles.english: Deliver it, the rhythm of water

subtitles.original: 響け　波のメロディ
subtitles.english: Resonate, melody of the waves

subtitles.original: 踊れ　歌え　舞い上がるまで　海より深い愛の街
subtitles.english: Dance, sing until you soar, a town of love deeper than the sea

subtitles.original: 揺れる　触れる　その柔らかさ　ありがとうを伝えたい
subtitles.english: Swaying, touching, that softness, I want to say thank you

subtitles.original: 嬉しい気持ち　いつでもベイビー　優しく包むこの街
subtitles.english: A happy feeling, always baby, this town that gently embraces us

subtitles.original: 最後は魔法を解かさない　明日の光射すディープ・ブルー
subtitles.english: Don't let the magic break at the end, the light of tomorrow shines, Deep Blue

subtitles.original: ハロニホン　こんにちは　ボンジュール　グーテンターク　アロハ！
subtitles.english: Halo-nihon, hello, bonjour, guten tag, aloha!

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　女々しくて
subtitles.english: Girlish, girlish, girlish

subtitles.original: つらいよォォォォォ！
subtitles.english: It's so painful!

subtitles.original: 僕のことをからかったの？　あんなに好きと言ったのに
subtitles.english: Were you making fun of me? Even though you said you liked me so much

subtitles.original: 奴のどこを気に入ったの？　僕はもういらないの？
subtitles.english: What part of him did you like? Am I not needed anymore?

subtitles.original: 君と手を繋ぎ踊りたい　たくさんの人混みの中で
subtitles.english: I want to hold your hand and dance amidst a large crowd

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔だけが　輝いて
subtitles.english: Only your smile shines bright

subtitles.original: 愛されたいねきっと見過ごした　君のシグナルもう一度
subtitles.english: I want to be loved, I probably missed it, your signal once more

subtitles.original: 気まぐれからでも構わない　君といたいから
subtitles.english: I don't care if it's just a whim, because I want to be with you

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　光を浴びて
subtitles.english: Girlish, girlish, bathing in the light

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　恋の歌歌って
subtitles.english: Girlish, girlish, singing a love song

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　辿り着いたこの世界はもう
subtitles.english: Girlish, girlish, this world I've reached is already...

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　女々しくて　つらいよ
subtitles.english: Girlish, girlish, girlish, it's so painful
